ModMetaData.name: More Dangerous Game
ModMetaData.author: Zylle
ModMetaData.description:
Your colonists will be prey! This mod makes the game harder.
Increase animal revenge chance, limit what predators can target to increase colonist deaths, and make *every* animal a predator! Fully configurable.
Settings include: Increase revenge chance.
Change what predators hunt: Vanilla: predators hunt their normal play Predators are not prey: Predators won't hunt other predators Humans are hunted: Wild predators only hunt humans. Tame predators don't hunt other predators. Colonists only: All predators, including pets, will only hunt colonists
What predators are: Vanilla: Predators are predators Corpse eaters: Anything that can eat a corpse, and normal predators More dangerous: Anything with combat power > 100, and normal predators Everything: Every animal is a predator!
Requires Harmony. Safe to add and remove.
